raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences/rows that meet the criteria:


A172 (human glioblastoma) and SKOV3 (human ovarian adenocarcinoma) cells were seeded in a 96 well plate at 30,000 or 40,000 cells per well respectively in phenol red-free RPMI supplemented with 10% FCS, 2 mM L-glutamine and 500 μΜ L-tryptophan.
Recombinant human IDO or TDO was incubated in 50 mM KP04 (pH 7.0), 0.5 mM EGTA, 0.5 mM EDTA, 0.05 % Triton™ XI 00, 20 mM ascorbate, 10 μΜ methylene blue, 500 U/ml catalase, 50 μg/ml KynB (kynurenine formamidase).
TDO assays were carried out in the presence of 330 μΜ L-tryptophan, while IDO assays had the addition of 45 μΜ L-tryptophan.
Purified protein was then diluted in assay buffer (50 mM Tris pH 7.0, 1% glycerol, 20 μΜ methylene blue, 0.05% Tween-20, 20 mM sodium ascorbate, 100 units/mL catalase to obtain a final IDOl concentration of 40 nM.
IDOl solution (30 μΜ) or buffer alone (30 μΜ) were dispensed to wells of the assay plate using a BioRAPTR liquid dispenser (Beckman Coulter).
10 μί of 400 μΜ tryptophan in assay buffer were added to each well of the assay plate using a BioRAPTR liquid dispenser.
The plates are allowed to cool and then centrifuged for 1 minute at lOOOxg.
The resulting fluoresence was measured in an Envision plate reader (Perkin Elmer) with a 400/25 nm excitation filter and an 510/20 nm emission filter.
Potencies were calculated by linear least squares fit to the four parameter logistic IC50 equation.
HEK293 cell pellets were resuspended to 5 x 10<sup>5</sup> cells/mL in complete HEK293 culture media (89% DMEM, 10% FBS, 1% penicilllin/streptomycin).
Flag-IDOl vector (Genscript True ORF Gold, 2 ug) in 150 uL of Opti-MEM medium was added to to each well of a Coming 24 well plate (Cat# 3527) and incubated for 5 minutes at room temperature.
To each well of the 24-well plate was added 150 Lipofectamine 2000 (Gibco) and the plate incubated at room temperature for 20-30 minutes.
Media was removed from the cells which were then washed with 2 mL Dulbecco's phosphate-buffered saline (DPBS).
After removal of DPBS, 0.5 mL of TrypLE (Gibco) was added and incubated at 5 minutes until cells lift from the surface.

Potencies were calculated by linear least squares fit to the four parameter logistic IC50 equation.
